{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Buffalo |model=WZR-300 |revision=HP |upc=747464126043 |asin=B0096239FG |est_release_date=09/02/2012 |fcc_date=04/26/2011 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Cameo |manuf_model=W302H |manuf_rev=V21 A3 |availability=now |type=wireless router |fcc_id=FDI-09101896-0 |ic_id=6102A-035 |pcb_id=21514W302HV21A3 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR7242 |cpu1_cspeed=400 |fla1=32 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L12845E |fla1_num=2 |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5TU32M16DG-AC |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag=yes,, 14-pin header,, J4 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, J3,, 3.3V TTL |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9283 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Atheros |sw_model=AR8316 |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags=high power |stock_boot=U-Boot;1.03; |stock_os=Linux;2.6.39.4; |tp_firmware=DD-WRT |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|AirStation HighPower N300 Wireless Gigabit Router}} :[http://www.buffalotech.com/products/wireless/single-band-wireless-routers/airstation-highpower-n300-gigabit-wireless-router-1 Product page]
*[http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/buffalo/wzr-hp-g300nh2 ''Buffalo WZR-300HP'' on the '''OpenWrt''' wiki] :This device is a newer revision of the [[Buffalo WZR-HP-G300NH2]] with a name change. :It ''may'' currently be supported by OpenWrt.
*[https://www.ifixit.com/Teardown/Buffalo+WZR-300HP+Wireless+Router+Teardown/98767 ''Buffalo WZR-300HP'' Teardown on '''iFixit'''] (internal images) :PCB: "WZR-HP-G302HV2", "21514W302HV21A3" and "Rev:A3"
===Reviews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/31957-buffalo-wzr-300hp-airstation-highpower-n300-gigabit-wireless-router-reviewed ''Buffalo WZR-300HP Reviewed'' on '''SmallNetBuilder''']
